Name: amvd
Overview: Automated Music Video Downloader :: AMVD is a Lidarr Companion script to automatically download and tag Music Videos for use in various media applications

Enable Automatic Script Start.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Enable Automatic Script Start.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Script Interval.Name: Script Interval
Script Interval.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

Musicbrainz Mirror URL.Name: Musicbrainz Mirror URL
Musicbrainz Mirror URL.Description: OPTIONAL: Only change if using a different mirror

Musicbrainz Rate Limit.Name: Musicbrainz Rate Limit
Musicbrainz Rate Limit.Description: OPTIONAL: musicbrainz rate limit, musicbrainz allows only 1 connection per second, max setting is 10

Music Videos Source Connection.Name: Music Videos Source Connection
Music Videos Source Connection.Description: lidarr or ama :: ama requires the AMA config folder to be mounted as a volume: /ama

Lidarr Url.Name: Lidarr Url
Lidarr Url.Description: Set domain or IP to your Lidarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s.

Music Videos Country Code.Name: Music Videos Country Code
Music Videos Country Code.Description: Set the country code for preferred video matching, uses Musicbrainz Country Codes, lowercase only.

Music Videos Require Match.Name: Music Videos Require Match
Music Videos Require Match.Description: true = enabled :: Only keep videos that could be matched to a Musicbrainz music track.

Music Videos Subtitle Langauge.Name: Music Videos Subtitle Langauge
Music Videos Subtitle Langauge.Description: Desired Language Code :: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

Music Videos Filter Match.Name: Music Videos Filter Match
Music Videos Filter Match.Description: This will filter out videos Matching MusicBrainz secondary release type and album disambiguation (single word only)

Music Videos Write NFO.Name: Music Videos Write NFO
Music Videos Write NFO.Description: true = enabled :: Create NFO and Local Thumbnail for use in applications such as Kodi

Music Videos Use Folders.Name: Music Videos Use Folders
Music Videos Use Folders.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders using the Lidarr Artist folder name

Music Videos Use Video Folders.Name: Music Videos Use Video Folders
Music Videos Use Video Folders.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders using Video File Name only, requires USEFOLDERS to be enabled
